General.Name: Jiangsu General Science Tech
General.Description: Jiangsu General Science Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tires in China and internationally. It offers steel radial tires, including short-distance industrial and mining tires, medium and short-distance load-bearing tires, medium and long-distance road transport tires, light truck tires, etc.; semi-steel radial tire products, such as family car tires, urban off-road tires, off-road tires, and commercial truck tires; bias tires; and cycle tires. The company provides its products under the CELIMO, GOODTRIP, TBBTIRES, CHITUMA, and TOWIN brands. It serves automobile manufacturers, construction machinery factories, tire dealers, and consumers. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China. Jiangsu General Science Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hongdou Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Next to Jin Gang Road, Wuxi, China, 214199
